column2: Press $0 to impart your wisdom into the spell
Press $0 dissect your books into pages
You can only win by Ascension, and can not visit parallel worlds.\n\n
Spray and Pray. Also has some magical properties...
You've been infected by a celestial being.\nYou feel your heart is having trouble beating.

I love watching the night sky, sometimes if I'm very lucky I can spot what looks like a constellation of jellyfish at night.\nUnlike other constellations I can't seem to outline their shape at day.\nI wish I could capture them in my journal, I feel like they'd bring my words to life.
You can see smaller jellyfish floating within.
Enemies will no longer drop gold.
A divine blessing allows you to tinker with wands, and your body, everywhere.\nPress [$0] to disguise.
